mapper.select: select Product.productId, productName, thumbnailImageUrl, IFNULL((select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId), 0) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, IFNULL((select content from Review R where R.productId=Product.productId limit 1), '') as review from Product where Product.status = 'Y' ORDER BY RAND()

select Product.productId, productName, makerName, IFNULL(thumbnailImageUrl, "") as thumbnailImageUrl, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, IFNULL((select content from Review R where R.productId=Product.productId limit 1), '') as review, TIMESTAMP(OL.updatedAt) date from Product left join Review R on Product.productId = R.productId inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId left join OrderList OL on R.orderListId = OL.orderListId where Product.status = 'Y' group by Product.productId ORDER BY date DESC

select Product.productId, productName, makerName, IFNULL(thumbnailImageUrl, "") as thumbnailImageUrl, TIMESTAMP (Product.createdAt) as date from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId where Product.status = 'Y' ORDER BY date DESC

select Product.productId, Product.categoryId, productName, makerName, IFNULL(thumbnailImageUrl, "") as thumbnailImageUrl, price, discountRate, tag, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, IFNULL((select content from Review R where R.productId=Product.productId limit 1), '') as review, vip from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId where Product.status = 'Y' ORDER BY RAND()

select Product.productId, Product.categoryId, productName, makerName, IFNULL(thumbnailImageUrl, "") as thumbnailImageUrl, price, discountRate, tag, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, IFNULL((select content from Review R where R.productId=Product.productId limit 1), '') as review, vip from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId where Product.status = 'F'

select Product.productId, Product.categoryId, productName, makerName, IFNULL(thumbnailImageUrl, '') as thumbnailImageUrl, price, discountRate, tag, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, IFNULL((select content from Review R where R.productId = Product.productId limit 1), '') as review, vip from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId inner join (select categoryId as userCategoryId from Product inner join User U on Product.productId = U.productId where U.userId = #{userId}) as userCategory where Product.status = 'Y' ORDER BY Product.categoryId = userCategory.userCategoryId desc
select productId from User where userId = #{userId}

select * from (select distinct Product.productId, Product.categoryId, productName, P.productKeyword, makerName, IFNULL(thumbnailImageUrl, '') as thumbnailImageUrl, price, discountRate, tag, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, IFNULL((select content from Review R where R.productId = Product.productId limit 1), '') as review, vip from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId inner join ProductKeyword P on Product.productId = P.productId inner join (select PK.productKeyword from Product inner join ProductKeyword PK on Product.productId = PK.productId where Product.productId = #{productId}) as userMaybe where Product.status = 'Y' ORDER BY P.productKeyword = userMaybe.productKeyword desc) as collection group by collection.productId

select Product.productId, Product.categoryId, productName, makerName, IFNULL(thumbnailImageUrl, "") as thumbnailImageUrl, price, discountRate, tag, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, IFNULL((select content from Review R where R.productId=Product.productId limit 1), '') as review, vip from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId where categoryId = #{categoryId} and Product.status = 'Y'

select Product.productId, Product.categoryId, productName, makerName, IFNULL(thumbnailImageUrl, '') as thumbnailImageUrl, price, discountRate, tag, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, IFNULL((select content from Review R where R.productId=Product.productId limit 1), '') as review, vip from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId where productName like '%${word}%' or makerName like '%${word}%' and Product.status = 'Y'

select Product.productId, Product.categoryId, makerName, productName, IFNULL(thumbnailImageUrl, '') thumbnailImageUrl, price, discountRate, tag, (select AVG(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as star, (select COUNT(star) from Review where Product.productId = Review.productId) as reviewCount, (select COUNT(distinct orderListId) from OrderList inner join Cart C on OrderList.cartId = C.cartId inner join SmallCart SC on C.cartId = SC.cartId inner join OrderDetail OD on SC.smallCartId = OD.smallCartId inner join ProductOption PO on OD.productOptionId = PO.productOptionId inner join Product P on PO.productId = P.productId where PO.productId = P.productId) as orderCount, deliveryTip, tipFreeMin, amount, IFNULL(productInfo, '') productInfo, (select count(likeListId) from LikeList inner join Product P on LikeList.productId = P.productId where P.productId = #{productId} and LikeList.status = 'Y') as likeCount from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId where Product.productId = #{productId}

select R.reviewId, U.userId, userName, R.updatedAt updateDate, IFNULL(profileImageUrl, "") profileImageUrl, star, IFNULL(imageUrl, "") imageUrl, IFNULL(R.content, "") content, IFNULL((select group_concat(distinct ProductOption.content separator ' ') from ProductOption inner join OrderDetail OD on ProductOption.productOptionId = OD.productOptionId inner join Product P on ProductOption.productId = P.productId inner join Review R on P.productId = R.productId where R.productId = 1), '') as productOption from Review R inner join OrderList OL on R.orderListId = OL.orderListId inner join Cart C on OL.cartId = C.cartId inner join User U on C.userId = U.userId where R.productId = #{productId}
select IFNULL(productKeyword, '') as productKeyword from ProductKeyword where ProductKeyword.productId = #{productId} and status = 'Y'

select Comment.commentId, IFNULL(profileImageUrl, '') as commentUserProfileImageUrl, userName as commentUserName, IFNULL(content, '') as commentContent from Comment inner join User U on Comment.userId = U.userId where Comment.productId = #{productId} and Comment.status = 'Y'

select Product.makerId, IFNULL(makerProfileImageUrl, '') makerProfileImageUrl, makerName, IFNULL((select AVG(star) from OrderList OL inner join Review on Review.orderListId = OL.orderListId inner join Cart C on OL.cartId = C.cartId inner join SmallCart SC on C.cartId = SC.cartId inner join OrderDetail OD on SC.smallCartId = OD.smallCartId inner join ProductOption PO on OD.productOptionId = PO.productOptionId inner join Product P on PO.productId = P.productId inner join Maker M on P.makerId = M.makerId where M.makerId = Product.makerId group by P.productId), 0) as star, (select Count(star) from OrderList OL inner join Review on Review.orderListId = OL.orderListId inner join Cart C on OL.cartId = C.cartId inner join SmallCart SC on C.cartId = SC.cartId inner join OrderDetail OD on SC.smallCartId = OD.smallCartId inner join ProductOption O on OD.productOptionId = O.productOptionId inner join Product P on O.productId = P.productId inner join Maker M on P.makerId = M.makerId where M.makerId = Product.makerId group by P.productId) as reviewCount, (select Count(likeListId) from LikeList inner join Product P on LikeList.productId = P.productId inner join Maker M on P.makerId = M.makerId where M.makerId = Product.makerId and LikeList.status = 'Y') as makerProductLikeCount, (select Count(followId) from Follow where makerId = Product.makerId) as followCount, (select Count(supportId) from Support where makerId = Product.makerId) as supportCount, M.profileDetail from Product inner join Maker M on Product.makerId = M.makerId where Product.productId = #{productId}
select distinct title, productId from ProductOption where productId = #{productId} and status = 'Y'
select productOptionId, IFNULL(content, '') content, addPrice from ProductOption where title = #{title} and productId = #{productId} and ProductOption.status = 'Y'
mapper.update: update User set productId = #{productId} where userId = #{userId}
mapper.select: select exists(select likeListId from LikeList where userId = #{userId} and productId = #{productId})
select status from LikeList where productId = #{productId} and userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: Update LikeList set status = #{status} where userId = #{userId} and productId = #{productId}
mapper.select: select productCouponId as couponId, couponName, rate, amount, priceMin, DATE_FORMAT(startDate, '%Y.%m.%d') as startDate, DATE_FORMAT(endDate, '%Y.%m.%d') as endDate, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, CURDATE(), endDate) as remainingDay, ProductCoupon.status from ProductCoupon where productId = #{productId} and ProductCoupon.status = 'Y'
select exists (select couponId from Coupon where productCouponId = #{productCouponId} and userId = #{userId} and status='Y')
